function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Infrastructure inequities enhance host susceptibility and can facilitate disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Zoonotic diseases originating from wildlife and domestic animals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conditions in peri-urban areas and highly urbanized centers favoring emergence of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral shedding and mutation due to human disturbances to habitats and animal hosts","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of familiarity with campus buildings and keys may lead to increased contact and exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proactive interaction with students may result in missed opportunities to identify and address health concerns or symptoms of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to act as representatives of the university may lead to missed opportunities to enforce health and safety measures and educate the campus community on disease prevention.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in classrooms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared patrol car assignments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential exposure to communicable diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient air distribution leading to temperature variations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate prediction of infection probability in confined spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on assumptions about droplet behavior and size","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited consideration of evaporation effects on infection probability","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of other significant paths of virus transmission, such as direct contact and droplet nuclei.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hypothesized initial infection probability may lead to deviation of projected infection probability and minimum ventilation rate.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hypothesized social distance may not reflect practical conditions, especially in spaces with strong population mobility or irregular shapes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of virus spreading by droplets of different sizes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited number of real cases used for model calibration","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sensitivity studies show reduced infection risk with occupancy rate reduction and social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low ventilation rates in indoor spaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation rate leading to high infection risk","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Social distancing impacting required ventilation rate","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standard-required minimum fresh air flow rate inadequate for risk mitigation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Linear increase in infection risk with exposure time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High infection probability in high-density occupancy areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in infection probability with occupancy ratio and exposure time","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncalibrated infective quantum q in the modified model based on limited data from a single representative case","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncalculated or misestimated ventilation rate on the bus","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inaccurate q values for specific systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to consider factors other than ventilation rate in the wells-riley model","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Evaporation altering the trajectory of droplets, increasing transmission distance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate assessment of air distribution effectiveness ez in confined spaces","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of modified wells-riley model for predicting infection risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Focus on larger droplets and neglect of smaller droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of water droplets in the
